title: Chilli Beef Tortillas
ingredients: ['12 thin slices minute (flash-fry or sandwich) steaks, about 350g in total', '1 tsp paprika', '1 tsp ground cumin', '3 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 yellow pepper, sliced', '2 chillies, preferably 1 red and 1 green, seeded and finely sliced', '4 x 20cm soft flour tortilla wraps', '1 ripe avocado, thinly sliced']
